## Query.exec() method

Executes the query with accumulated options

**Signature:**

```typescript
exec(): Promise<ResultType>;
```
**Returns:**

Promise&lt;ResultType&gt;


## Example


```ts
const query = new Query(idb, "store-name");
const item = await query.findById("id").exec();
```
